ID,
ORIGIN_ID,
ORIGIN_NAME,
SITE_CODE,
STATUS,
CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update index_xh_media_origin
ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update index_xh_media_origin set ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM index_xh_media_origin GROUP BY ORIGIN_ID ORDER BY ORIGIN_ID

SELECT
FROM index_xh_media_origin WHERE site_code=#{0} GROUP BY ORIGIN_ID ORDER BY ORIGIN_ID
SELECT origin_name FROM index_xh_media_origin WHERE origin_id=#{0} LIMIT 1
